com.sersolutions.doxis4helpers.commons

Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sersolutions.doxis4helpers.commons.Connector

  • public class Connector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for connection to Doxis4 server.

    Don't need to use this if you already have some connection (when write scripts for AgentServer or webCube scripting)

    • Method Detail

      • initServer

        public void initServer(java.lang.String archiveServerName,
                       java.lang.String archivePort,
                       java.lang.String tempDir)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        This method initializes the class factory and the document server instance.
        Parameters:
        archiveServerName - Host name of the web application server that hosts DOXiS4 CSB.
        archivePort - Port number used by the web application server, for example 8080.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case of any error.

      • closeServer

        public void closeServer()
        This method closes the IDocumentServer object. It must be invoked, if the IDocumentServer object is no longer needed to release all used resources
        Throws:
        com.ser.blueline.BlueLineException - in case of errors

      • login

        public java.lang.Boolean login(java.lang.String systemName,
                               java.lang.String userName,
                               java.lang.String password)
                        throws com.ser.blueline.BlueLineException
        Logs on a user. After login session will be available by getSession() method.
        Parameters:
        systemName - The name of the organization\mandant\tenant to log on to.
        userName - The name of the user to log on.
        password - The password of the user.
        Returns:
        boolean that means was connection successful or not * @throws BlueLineException in case of any error.
        Throws:
        com.ser.blueline.BlueLineException

      • logout

        public void logout()
            throws com.ser.blueline.BlueLineException
        This methods finishes the user session.
        Throws:
        com.ser.blueline.BlueLineException

      • isInit

        public java.lang.Boolean isInit()
        This method checks if server was initialized
        Returns:
        Boolean true or false

        Boolean true or false
